post.title: Hitman & Gun darknet market (With new decentralized moderation)
post.body:
Below recommendations is for keeping cops not interested in investigating.
**Assassin Condition:**
In west countries:
Only non-white targets (non-European) in western countries
In east countries:
Only young male targets in east countries allowed.
**Gun sell conditions:**
1- No heavy weapons anywhere. In west countries automatic weapons are not allowed
2- In east countries it is recommended buyer be a male and living in a home in the above-average zones (Usually they buy it for revenge usually a brother) it reduce your country security agent intervention risk. Usually opposition militias are poor peoples ready to risk their lives.
**Seller guide:**
send your ad details below. (click the above title to see comment section)
**Moderator for disputes:**
For arbitration https://kleros.io/ or Jur.io can be used. Although it need some tinkering. Post your selling ad below so me or other developers start working on it
